activities: NAG developes and sells numeric and scientific software.  Information is collected for shipping and billing purposes.  It is also obtained through on-line surveys for product development and marketing purposes.  Current and potential customers receive regular e-mail newsletters and new product informational mailings.
privacyprograms: Not a member of an oustide organization at this time.
recoursemech: Numerical Algorithms Group, Inc., commits to cooperate with EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) or their authorized representatives.  In the event that an unresolved complaint is received, Numerical Algorithms Group will seek the recommendation of an independent, third party services to resolve the complaint.
